title: Add NotebookEdit to hooks.json matcher
description: hooks.json matcher Edit|Write|MultiEdit misses NotebookEdit, creating enforcement gap for .ipynb files. One-line fix: add NotebookEdit to the matcher regex.

title: Fix $CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT in autopilot.sh deny reason
description: autopilot.sh line 42 tells Claude to use $CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT in a Bash call, but that variable isn't exported to Bash. Skills use find-based resolution instead. This causes a confusing failure loop on first use. Fix: shorten deny reason to headline + file hint, remove command template. Let SKILL.md provide dispatch instructions.

title: Add progress communication to autopilot/SKILL.md
description: Long operations (2-10 min dispatch, 5-10 min debate) give no upfront time estimate or mid-process status. Add instructions telling Claude to announce expected durations before each dispatch. Mention --rounds 1 as option for simpler debates.

title: Fix jq fallback JSON injection in autopilot.sh
description: autopilot.sh lines 53-63: when jq unavailable, heredoc interpolates $DENY_REASON containing file path. File paths with quotes or backslashes break JSON. Hook fails open (silently allows the write through). Fix: replace fallback with static JSON string or always require jq.

title: Add mode comparison table to README or AGENTS.md
description: Users face 4 overlapping modes (manual /interclode, codex-first, autopilot, debate) with no selection guide. Add a 'Which Mode?' table with columns: Mode / Enforcement / Toggle / Best For.

title: Add Round 1 output guard to debate.sh
description: debate.sh lines 245-249: if Codex produces no output file (a documented known issue), cat $ROUND1_OUTPUT fails cryptically under set -e before Round 2. Add file-existence check with clear error message.

title: Fix Bash governance self-contradiction in autopilot/SKILL.md
description: Git operations (git add, commit, push) listed under 'Dispatch via Codex' then immediately exempted in a bold Exception block. Move git ops to 'Allowed Bash Commands' section to eliminate confusion.
